"Sonner Destruction Trials":
"In these Trials, your objective is to destroy a Sonner, an automatic interceptor which targets players.

The Sonner is protected by a shield. To remove the shield, you must destroy all the Dazzle Pods around it. Once the shield is down, destroy the Sonner to clear the Trial."

"Dazzle Pods are difficult to see, but give off strong light and heat, and can also be detected by Active Sonar.

Destroying a Control Pod or enough of the Dazzle Pods will reveal all Dazzle Pods on your radar map."
"After clearing the Trial, you can attack the Sonner to obtain items, such as Ores."
